member.name: FXECHO_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Parameters for use with the FXECHO XAPOFX.

member.name: FXECHO_PARAMETERS.WetDryMix
member.summary: Ratio of wet (processed) signal to dry (original) signal.

member.name: FXECHO_PARAMETERS.Feedback
member.summary: Amount of output to feed back into input.

member.name: FXECHO_PARAMETERS.Delay
member.summary: Delay to all channels in milliseconds. This value must be between FXECHO_MIN_DELAY and .MaxDelay.
